definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience

sentences.chinese: 这样亚扪人就被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: Thus the children of Ammon were subdued before the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 这样亚扪人就被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: Gebal, Ammon and Amalek, Philistia, with the people of Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 迦巴勒，亚扪，和亚玛力，非利士，并推罗的居民。

sentences.english: In the course of time, Nahash king of the Ammonites died, and his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 此后，亚扪人的王拿辖死了，他儿子接续他作王。

sentences.english: So the Syrians feared to help the children of Ammon any more.
sentences.chinese: 于是亚兰人不敢再帮助亚扪人了。

sentences.english: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together, and encamped in Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 当时亚扪人聚集，安营在基列。

sentences.english: The younger had a child and named him Ammi and he is the father of the Ammonites.
sentences.chinese: 小女儿生了一个儿子名亚米，他是亚扪人的始祖。

sentences.english: So the Arameans were not willing to help the Ammonites anymore.
sentences.chinese: 于是亚兰人不敢再帮助亚扪人了。

sentences.english: I can still be proud, you don't care about children's heart.
sentences.chinese: 俄依旧可以高傲，不在乎沵扪的心跳。

sentences.english: Then Jephthah went over to fight the Ammonites, and the LORD gave them into his hands.
sentences.chinese: 于是耶弗他往亚扪人那里去，与他们争战。

sentences.english: Now after this Nahash the king of the Ammonites died, and his son reigned in his place.
sentences.chinese: 此后，亚扪人的王拿辖死了，他儿子接续他作王。

sentences.english: thou hast killed Uriah the Hittite with the sword, and hast taken his wife to be thy wife, and hast slain him with the sword of the children of Ammon.
sentences.chinese: 你借亚扪人的刀杀害赫人乌利亚，又娶了他的妻为妻。

sentences.english: Howbeit the king of the children of Ammon hearkened not unto the words of Jephthah which he sent him.
sentences.chinese: 但亚扪人的王不肯听耶弗他打发人说的话。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Naamah the Ammonite.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫拿玛，是亚扪人。

sentences.english: And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities， and came to battle.
sentences.chinese: 亚扪人也从他们的城里出来，聚集交战。

sentences.english: So Joab returned from the children of Ammon, and came to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 约押就离开亚扪人那里，回耶路撒冷去了。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
old name for the Dadu River 大渡河[Da4 du4 He2] in Sichuan
zedoary (Curcuma zedoaria), plant rhizome similar to turmeric
to vomit (of dogs and cats)/to rail against/to talk nonsense
